topic:
Senior Python Backend Developer
    
    We are looking for an experienced Python developer to lead our backend team.
    
    Requirements:
    - 5+ years Python development
    - FastAPI or Django experience
    - PostgreSQL and Redis
    - Docker and Kubernetes
    
    Responsibilities:
    - Design and implement scalable backend systems
    - Lead technical discussions
    - Mentor junior developers
    - Deploy and maintain production systems
title: Backend Services - Senior Python Backend Developer

lines.text: (confused) Barack, I was... I was scrolling on the... the thing, and I'm broke. (sighing) Tech is too hard, man.
(confident) Look, Joe, this Senior Python role is your entry point. (sarcastic) You just need to lead a team through the weeds.
(shouting) Wrong! (excited) It's a goldmine, Joe! They'll mentor your sleepy brain and carry you to the finish line!
(surprised) Mentors? (confused) But I don't know Python or the... the Docker containers! Is that for boats?
(calm) Let me be clear: Five years of coding, Django, and Kubernetes. (confident) The perks are tremendous.
(boastful) The salary is huge, folks! Best benefits, big league equity. (shouting) Don't be a loser, sign the contract!
(interested) Equity? (excited) No malarkey? (grateful) Alright, Iâ€™m locking in! Let's build the big backend!
